text: Potom ozhestochilis' vashi serdtsa i stali kak kamen' i dazhe yeshche zhestche. I, voistinu, yest' kamni, iz kotorykh b'yut rodniki, yest' takiye, kotoryye raskalyvayutsya i istorgayut vodu, i yest' takiye, kotoryye nizvergayutsya [s gornykh vershin] ot strakha pered Allakhom. Allakh vedayet o tom, chto vy tvorite
